title: Neo4j AML Dashboard - Anti Money Laundering Investigation

parameters.neodash_Q1: MATCH p6 =(st1:StreetAddress)<-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]-(n:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:USES_DEVICE]->(:Device)<-[:USES_DEVICE]-(ac:AccountHolder)-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(st2:StreetAddress) where n<>ac and st1.postalCode<>st2.postalCode

pages.title: AML - Overview by Customer Type and Scenario

reports.title: Rapid Movement
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (cu:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->(:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State)
WHERE state.stateCode <> ""
MATCH (cu)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction)
WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
WITH startDate as startDate, endDate, da, count(txn.amount) as NumDeposits, sum(txn.amount) as TotalDeposits
WHERE TotalDeposits > 10000
        
MATCH (da)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(txn:Transaction)
WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
WITH startDate, endDate, da, NumDeposits, TotalDeposits,
count(txn.amount) as NumWithdrawals,
sum(txn.amount) as TotalWithdrawals,
abs(sum(txn.amount))/TotalDeposits as pctWithdrawal
WHERE pctWithdrawal > 0.75
        
WITH da, 
(CASE 
  WHEN pctWithdrawal >= 0.95 THEN "1. High"
  WHEN 0.85 <= pctWithdrawal < 0.95 THEN "2. Moderate"
  ELSE "3. Low"
END) as Category
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Rapid Movement
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (cu:BusinessCustomer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
(:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State)
// WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
MATCH (cu)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction)
WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
  AND NOT toUpper(cu.FinCEN_110_status)="ON FILE"
WITH startDate, endDate, da, count(txn.amount) as NumDeposits, sum(txn.amount) as TotalDeposits
WHERE TotalDeposits > 100000

MATCH (da)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(txn:Transaction)
WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
WITH startDate, endDate, da, NumDeposits, TotalDeposits,
count(txn.amount) as NumWithdrawals,
sum(txn.amount) as TotalWithdrawals,
abs(sum(txn.amount))/TotalDeposits as pctWithdrawal
WHERE pctWithdrawal > 0.75

WITH da, 
(CASE 
  WHEN pctWithdrawal >= 0.95 THEN "1. High"
  WHEN 0.85 <= pctWithdrawal < 0.95 THEN "2. Moderate"
  ELSE "3. Low"
END) as Category
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts

reports.title: Accumulation
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (cu:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        //WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (cu)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction) 
        WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        
        WITH startDate, endDate, da, count(txn.amount) as NumDeposits, sum(txn.amount) as TotalDeposits 
        WHERE TotalDeposits > 25000 
        MATCH (da)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(txn:Transaction) 
        WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate 
        WITH startDate, endDate, da, NumDeposits, TotalDeposits, 
          count(txn.amount) as NumWithdrawals,
          sum(txn.amount) as TotalWithdrawals,
          abs(sum(txn.amount))/TotalDeposits as pctWithdrawal 
        WHERE pctWithdrawal <= 0.25

        WITH da, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN pctWithdrawal <= 0.08 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN 0.08 < pctWithdrawal < 0.15 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'
          END) as Category
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Concentration
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as vStartDate, date("2019-12-31") as vEndDate, 6500 as vThreshold
MATCH (custB:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
       // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (custB)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(acctB:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->
            (txnB:Transaction)-[:DEBITS|INTERNAL_XFER|RECEIVES_WIRE]->(acctC)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(custC:AccountHolder)
        WHERE vStartDate <= txnB.transactionDate <= vEndDate
          AND abs(txnB.amount) >= vThreshold
          AND (
              (NOT (custB)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID))
              OR ((custB)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList))
            OR (NOT (custC)-[:IS_LEGAL_ENTITY]->(:LegalEntity))
            OR (NOT (custC)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID))
            OR (custC:BusinessCustomer and custC.FinCEN_110_status<>"on file")
            OR ((custC)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList))
          )
        WITH vStartDate, vEndDate, vThreshold, custB, acctB
          , count(txnB.amount) as numWithdrawals
          , abs(sum(txnB.amount)) as sumWithdrawals
          , count(distinct custC) as numTargets
        
        MATCH (custB)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(acctB)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txnB:Transaction)<-[:CREDITS|INTERNAL_XFER|SENDS_WIRE]-
          (acctA)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(custA:AccountHolder)
        WHERE vStartDate <= txnB.transactionDate <= vEndDate
          AND ((NOT (custA)-[:IS_LEGAL_ENTITY]->(:LegalEntity))
            OR (NOT (custA)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID))
            OR (custA:BusinessCustomer and custA.FinCEN_110_status<>"on file")
            OR ((custA)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList))
          )
        WITH custB, acctB, numTargets, numWithdrawals, sumWithdrawals
          , count(txnB.amount) as numDeposits
          , sum(txnB.amount) as sumDeposits
          , count(distinct custA) as numSources
        
        WHERE sumDeposits >= sumWithdrawals
          AND sumDeposits*0.85 <= sumWithdrawals
          AND numDeposits > numWithdrawals
          AND numSources > numTargets
        WITH custB, (CASE
          WHEN sumDeposits > 15000 THEN "1. High"
          WHEN 8500 < sumDeposits <= 15000 THEN "2. Moderate"
  ELSE "3. Low"
        END) as Category

RETURN Category, count(custB) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

          WHEN 8500 < sumDeposits <= 15000 THEN "2. Moderate"
  ELSE "3. Low"
        END) as Category

RETURN Category, count(custB) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Concentration
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as vStartDate, date("2019-12-31") as vEndDate, 50000 as vThreshold
MATCH (custB:BusinessCustomer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (custB)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(acctB:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->
            (txnB:Transaction)-[:DEBITS|INTERNAL_XFER|RECEIVES_WIRE]->(acctC)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(custC:AccountHolder)
        WHERE vStartDate <= txnB.transactionDate <= vEndDate
          AND abs(txnB.amount) >= vThreshold
          AND ((custB.FinCEN_110_status <> "on file")
            OR (NOT (custC)-[:IS_LEGAL_ENTITY]->(:LegalEntity)) 
            OR (NOT (custC)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID))
            OR (custC:BusinessCustomer and custC.FinCEN_110_status<>"on file")
            OR ((custC)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList))
          )
        WITH vStartDate, vEndDate, vThreshold, custB, acctB
          , count(txnB.amount) as numWithdrawals
          , abs(sum(txnB.amount)) as sumWithdrawals
          , count(distinct custC) as numTargets
        
        MATCH (custB)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(acctB)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txnB:Transaction)<-[:CREDITS|INTERNAL_XFER|SENDS_WIRE]-(acctA)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(custA:AccountHolder)
        WHERE vStartDate <= txnB.transactionDate <= vEndDate
          AND (
              (NOT (custA)-[:IS_LEGAL_ENTITY]->(:LegalEntity)) 
            OR (NOT (custA)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID)) 
            OR (custA:BusinessCustomer and custA.FinCEN_110_status<>"on file")
            OR ((custA)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList)) 
          )
        WITH custB, acctB, numTargets, numWithdrawals, sumWithdrawals
          , count(txnB.amount) as numDeposits
          , sum(txnB.amount) as sumDeposits
          , count(distinct custA) as numSources
        
        WHERE sumDeposits >= sumWithdrawals
          AND sumDeposits*0.85 <= sumWithdrawals
          AND numDeposits >= numWithdrawals * 5
          AND numSources >= numTargets * 5
        
        WITH custB, (CASE
          WHEN sumDeposits > 200000 THEN "1. High"
          WHEN 100000 < sumDeposits <= 200000 THEN "2. Moderate"
  ELSE "3. Low"
END) as Category
RETURN Category, count(custB) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: High Risk Geo
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->
                (xfer:Wire:Transaction)-[:RECEIVES_WIRE]->(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:IBAN_ROUTING]->
            (iban:IBAN_Code)<-[:HAS_IBAN_CODE]-(fi:FinancialInstitution)-[:OPERATES_IN]->(cty:Country)
        WHERE startDate <= xfer.transactionDate <= endDate
          AND cty.fraudScore > 0.1
          AND left(iban.ibanNumber,2)=cty.countryCode
        // collect the accounts and xfers
        WITH ah, sum(xfer.amount) as wireAmount, max(cty.fraudScore) as riskScore
        WITH ah, wireAmount, riskScore, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN riskScore > 0.6 OR wireAmount >= 50000 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN riskScore > 0.3 OR 10000 < wireAmount < 50000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category
  
RETURN Category, count(*) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: High Risk Geo
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->
                (xfer:Wire:Transaction)-[:RECEIVES_WIRE]->(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:IBAN_ROUTING]->
            (iban:IBAN_Code)<-[:HAS_IBAN_CODE]-(fi:FinancialInstitution)-[:OPERATES_IN]->(cty:Country)
        WHERE startDate <= xfer.transactionDate <= endDate
          AND cty.fraudScore > 0.1
          AND left(iban.ibanNumber,2)=cty.countryCode
        // collect the accounts and xfers
        WITH ah, sum(xfer.amount) as wireAmount, max(cty.fraudScore) as riskScore
        WITH ah, wireAmount, riskScore, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN riskScore > 0.6 OR wireAmount >= 50000 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN riskScore > 0.3 OR 10000 < wireAmount < 50000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category
  
RETURN Category, count(*) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: High Risk Geo
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:BusinessCustomer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->
          (xfer:Wire:Transaction)-[:RECEIVES_WIRE]->(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:IBAN_ROUTING]->
            (iban:IBAN_Code)<-[:HAS_IBAN_CODE]-(fi:FinancialInstitution)-[:OPERATES_IN]->(cty:Country)
        WHERE startDate <= xfer.transactionDate <= endDate
          AND cty.fraudScore > 0.1
          AND left(iban.ibanNumber,2)=cty.countryCode
        // collect the accounts and xfers
        WITH ah, sum(xfer.amount) as wireAmount, max(cty.fraudScore) as riskScore
        WITH ah, wireAmount, riskScore, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN riskScore > 0.6 OR wireAmount >= 250000 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN riskScore > 0.3 OR 150000 < wireAmount < 250000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'
END) as Category
RETURN Category, count(*) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: High Risk Geo
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:BusinessCustomer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->
          (xfer:Wire:Transaction)-[:RECEIVES_WIRE]->(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:IBAN_ROUTING]->
            (iban:IBAN_Code)<-[:HAS_IBAN_CODE]-(fi:FinancialInstitution)-[:OPERATES_IN]->(cty:Country)
        WHERE startDate <= xfer.transactionDate <= endDate
          AND cty.fraudScore > 0.1
          AND left(iban.ibanNumber,2)=cty.countryCode
        // collect the accounts and xfers
        WITH ah, sum(xfer.amount) as wireAmount, max(cty.fraudScore) as riskScore
        WITH ah, wireAmount, riskScore, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN riskScore > 0.6 OR wireAmount >= 250000 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN riskScore > 0.3 OR 150000 < wireAmount < 250000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'
END) as Category
RETURN Category, count(*) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: High Risk Entity
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(txn:Transaction)
                -[:INTERNAL_XFER|RECEIVES_WIRE|DEBITS]->()<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(bad:AccountHolder)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(wl:WatchList)
        WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        WITH ah,
          (CASE 
            WHEN wl.riskFactor > 0.7 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN 0.5 <= wl.riskFactor <= 0.7 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category  
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Unknown Owner
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
        (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
      // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
      MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction)
      WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        AND (NOT (ah)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID) OR NOT (ah)<-[:EMPLOYEE_ACCOUNT]-(:Employee))
      WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits
      WITH ah, 
        (CASE
          WHEN sumDeposits > 50000 THEN '1. High'
          WHEN 10000 <= sumDeposits <= 50000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category  
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Unknown Owner
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
        (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
      // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
      MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction)
      WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        AND (NOT (ah)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID) OR NOT (ah)<-[:EMPLOYEE_ACCOUNT]-(:Employee))
      WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits
      WITH ah,

          WHEN sumDeposits > 50000 THEN '1. High'

reports.title: Unknown Owner
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:BusinessCustomer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
        (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State) 
      // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
      MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction)
      WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        AND NOT (ah)-[:IS_LEGAL_ENTITY]->(:LegalEntity)
      WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits
      WITH ah, 
        (CASE
          WHEN sumDeposits > 250000 THEN '1. High'
          WHEN 150000 <= sumDeposits <= 250000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category  
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Unknown Owner
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate

      WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits

reports.title: Cash Intensive Business
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State)
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Cash:Transaction)
        WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        //  AND (NOT (ah)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID) OR NOT (ah)<-[:EMPLOYEE_ACCOUNT]-(:Employee))
        WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits, count(txn) as numDeposits
        WHERE numDeposits > 4
        WITH ah, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN sumDeposits > 50000 AND numDeposits > 7 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN 10000 <= sumDeposits <= 50000 AND numDeposits >5 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category  
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Cash Intensive Business
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:Customer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State)
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Cash:Transaction)
        WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
        //  AND (NOT (ah)-[:HAS_GOVT_ID]->(:GovtIssuedID) OR NOT (ah)<-[:EMPLOYEE_ACCOUNT]-(:Employee))
        WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits, count(txn) as numDeposits
        WHERE numDeposits > 4
        WITH ah, 
          (CASE 
            WHEN sumDeposits > 50000 AND numDeposits > 7 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN 10000 <= sumDeposits <= 50000 AND numDeposits >5 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category  
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

reports.title: Cash Intensive Business
reports.query:
WITH date("2019-12-01") as startDate, date("2019-12-31") as endDate
MATCH (ah:BusinessCustomer:AccountHolder)-[:CURRENT_RESIDENCE|BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(:StreetAddress)-[:IN_POSTALCODE]->
          (:PostalCode)-[:IN_CITY]-(:City)-[:IN_STATE]->(state:State)
        // WHERE state.stateCode IN stateCodes
        MATCH (ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(acct:DepositAccount)<-[:DEPOSITS]-(txn:Transaction)
        WHERE startDate <= txn.transactionDate <= endDate
          AND NOT ah.FinCEN_110_status='on file'
        //  AND NOT (ah)-[:IS_LEGAL_ENTITY]->(:LegalEntity)
        WITH ah, sum(txn.amount) as sumDeposits
        WITH ah,
          (CASE 
            WHEN sumDeposits > 250000 THEN '1. High'
            WHEN 150000 <= sumDeposits <= 250000 THEN '2. Moderate'
  ELSE '3. Low'         
END) as Category  
RETURN Category, count(Category) as numAlerts ORDER BY Category

pages.title: AML - Investigate by Shared Personal Info

reports.title: Search by account holder ID
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`AccountHolder`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`accountHolderID`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`accountHolderID` as value,  n.`accountHolderID` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

settings.description: Type a number in order to find specific Customer ID (e.g. 55716 - Trioptics, 52121 - Hunters Run ..., 57907, etc.)

reports.title: Customer Information
reports.query:
MATCH (cu1:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[]->(ad:StreetAddress)
Return cu1.accountHolderID AS ID, cu1.accountName AS Name, ad.cityName AS City, ad.postalCode AS ZipCode, cu1.fraudScore AS FraudScore;

reports.title: Customer Exploration - Shared EMail
reports.query:
MATCH p1=(cu1:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:HAS_EMAIL]->()<-[:HAS_EMAIL]-(cu2:AccountHolder) WHERE id(cu1)<>id(cu2)
Return p1

settings.description: This graph shows, customers or businesses sharing the same email address.

reports.title: Customer Exploration - Shared EMail + same Devices used to access Account
reports.query:
MATCH p1=(cu1:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:HAS_EMAIL]->()<-[:HAS_EMAIL]-(cu2:AccountHolder) WHERE id(cu1)<>id(cu2)
MATCH p6 =(st1:StreetAddress)<-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]-(n:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:USES_DEVICE]->(:Device)<-[:USES_DEVICE]-(ac:AccountHolder)-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(st2:StreetAddress) where n<>ac and st1.postalCode<>st2.postalCode
Return p1,p6

settings.description: This graph shows, customers or businesses sharing the same email address and accessing the same account with different devices.

reports.title: Customer Exploration - ... and access from different Geo-Coordinates
reports.query:
MATCH p1=(cu1:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:HAS_EMAIL]->()<-[:HAS_EMAIL]-(cu2:AccountHolder) WHERE id(cu1)<>id(cu2)
MATCH p6 =(st1:StreetAddress)<-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]-(n:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:USES_DEVICE]->(:Device)<-[:USES_DEVICE]-(ac:AccountHolder)-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]->(st2:StreetAddress) where n<>ac and st1.postalCode<>st2.postalCode
MATCH p3= (s:StreetAddress)<-[:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]-(ah:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[:ONLINE_SESSIONS]->(asc:AccountSession)-[:SESSION_IP]->(:IPAddress)-[:IP_IN_CITY]->(c:City) where c.cityName<>s.cityName and date("2019-08-01")<=date(asc.sessionDateTime)<=date("2019-09-05") 
Return p1,p6,p3

settings.description: This graph shows, customers or businesses sharing the same email address and accessing the same account with different devices and different geo locations!

reports.title: Company/Customer names matching by "Entity Resolutions"
reports.query:
MATCH (cu1:AccountHolder{accountHolderID:$neodash_accountholder_accountholderid})-[rel:ENTITY_RESOLUTION]->(cu2:AccountHolder) WHERE id(cu1)<>id(cu2)
RETURN cu1, rel, cu2;

settings.description: This graphics shows customers or businesses identified as potentially the same using different entity resolution scores.

reports.title: Search Deposit Account ID
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`DepositAccount`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`accountHolderID`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`accountHolderID` as value,  n.`accountHolderID` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

settings.description: Search Corporate Deposit Account ID (e.g. 57636, 56464, 55164, 55976, etc.)

reports.title: Layered concentration graph
reports.query:
MATCH p4=(cu1:AccountHolder)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da1:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(txn1)-[:DEBITS]->(acctB)-[:CREDITS]->(txn2)-[:DEPOSITS]->(da2:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu2:AccountHolder)
WHERE id(da1)<>id(da2) 
AND txn1.transactionDate <= date("2019-08-01") 
AND txn1.transactionDate >= date("2019-06-27") 
AND txn2.transactionDate>=txn1.transactionDate 
AND duration.inDays(txn1.transactionDate,txn2.transactionDate).days < 30.000000 
AND txn2.amount > abs(txn1.amount) * 0.600000 
AND txn2.amount < abs(txn1.amount) 
AND abs(txn1.amount) > 500.000000
Return p4

settings.description: Shows possible layered concentration of business customers Deposit Accounts.

reports.title: Business Account Details
reports.query:
MATCH  (ba:StreetAddress)<-[r:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]-(ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid})
RETURN ah.businessName AS AccountName, da.balance AS Balance, ah.fraudScore AS FraudScore, ba.streetAddress AS Street, ba.cityName AS City, ba.postalCode AS PostalCode;

settings.description: Customer Account Details Table

reports.title: Watch List Entry for Account
reports.query:
MATCH (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:BusinessCustomer)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(wl:WatchList)
RETURN wl.basis AS Basis, wl.watchEntityName AS Name, wl.riskFactor AS FraudScore

settings.description: Shows Entry of Account on Watch List with associated Person.

reports.title: Transactions involved
reports.query:
MATCH (cu1:AccountHolder)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da1:DepositAccount)-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(txn1)-[:DEBITS]->(acctB)-[:CREDITS]->(txn2)-[:DEPOSITS]->(da2:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu2:AccountHolder)
WHERE id(da1)<>id(da2) 
AND txn1.transactionDate <= date("2019-08-01") 
AND txn1.transactionDate >= date("2019-06-27") 
AND txn2.transactionDate>=txn1.transactionDate 
AND duration.inDays(txn1.transactionDate,txn2.transactionDate).days < 30.000000 
AND txn2.amount > abs(txn1.amount) * 0.600000 
AND txn2.amount < abs(txn1.amount) 
AND abs(txn1.amount) > 500.000000
Return da1.accountNumber AS FromAccount, txn1.transactionDate AS FromDate, txn1.amount AS FromAmount, txn2.amount AS ToAmount, txn2.transactionDate AS ToDate, da2.accountNumber AS ToAccount

settings.description: List all involved transactions from outgoing Deposit Account to incoming Deposit Account.

reports.title: Account Person - Fraud Level Indication
reports.query:
MATCH (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:BusinessCustomer)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(wl:WatchList)
RETURN wl.riskFactor*100 AS FraudScore ORDER BY FraudScore LIMIT 1

reports.title: Search Corporate Customer ID
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`BusinessCustomer`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`accountHolderID`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`accountHolderID` as value,  n.`accountHolderID` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

settings.description: Search for Business Account IDs (e.g. 50637).

reports.title: Possible related Business Accounts
reports.query:
MATCH p1=(da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_businesscustomer_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(ah:AccountHolder)-[:ENTITY_RESOLUTION]->()
Return p1

reports.title: Corparate Account Details
reports.query:
MATCH (ba:StreetAddress)<-[r:BUSINESS_ADDRESS]-(ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_businesscustomer_accountholderid})-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(xfer:Wire:Transaction)-[:RECEIVES_WIRE]->(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:IBAN_ROUTING]->(iban:IBAN_Code)<-[:HAS_IBAN_CODE]-(fi:FinancialInstitution)-[:OPERATES_IN]->(cty:Country) WHERE xfer.transactionDate <= date("2019-08-01") AND xfer.transactionDate >= date("2019-06-27") AND left(iban.ibanNumber,2)=cty.countryCode AND cty.fraudScore > 0.600000  
RETURN ah.businessName AS AccountName, da.balance AS Balance, ah.fraudScore AS FraudScore, ba.streetAddress AS Street, ba.cityName AS City, ba.postalCode AS PostalCode;

reports.title: Corporates on High Risk Geo and Watch List
reports.query:
MATCH p1=(ah)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_businesscustomer_accountholderid})-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(xfer:Wire:Transaction)-[:RECEIVES_WIRE]->(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:IBAN_ROUTING]->(iban:IBAN_Code)<-[:HAS_IBAN_CODE]-(fi:FinancialInstitution)-[:OPERATES_IN]->(cty:Country) WHERE xfer.transactionDate <= date("2019-08-01") AND xfer.transactionDate >= date("2019-06-27") AND left(iban.ibanNumber,2)=cty.countryCode AND cty.fraudScore > 0.600000
MATCH p2= (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_businesscustomer_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList)
Return p1,p2

settings.description: Corporate customers making transactions with high risk geo locations and being watch listed.

reports.title: Watch List Entry for Account
reports.query:
MATCH (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_businesscustomer_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:BusinessCustomer)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(wl:WatchList)
RETURN wl.basis AS Basis, wl.watchEntityName AS Name, wl.riskFactor AS FraudScore

reports.title: Account Person - Fraud Level Indication
reports.query:
MATCH (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_businesscustomer_accountholderid})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:BusinessCustomer)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(wl:WatchList)
RETURN wl.riskFactor*100 AS FraudScore ORDER BY FraudScore LIMIT 1

reports.title: Accounts on Watchlist
reports.query:
MATCH  (ah:AccountHolder)-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]->(da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid_5})
RETURN  ah.accountName AS Name, toString(ah.accountHolderID) AS AccountID, da.balance AS Balance, ah.fraudScore AS FraudScore;

settings.description: Customers on Watch List with High Risk Factor

reports.title: Watch List Name - Connected Nodes
reports.query:
MATCH p3=(ext:ExternalAccount)-[:SENDS_WIRE]->(wire:Wire:Transaction)-[:DEPOSITS]->(acct:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid_5})-[:WITHDRAWALS]->(cash:Cash:Transaction)-[:OCCURS_AT]->(ATMLocation) WHERE cash.transactionDate>=wire.transactionDate AND duration.inDays(wire.transactionDate,cash.transactionDate).days <= 10.000000
Return p3

reports.title: Account Owner Selection
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`DepositAccount`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`accountHolderID`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`accountHolderID` as value,  n.`accountHolderID` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

settings.description: Search for Consumer Account ID to investigate in Rapid Movement of Funds or Rapid Deposits (e.g. 48942, etc.)

reports.query:
MATCH (da)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:BusinessCustomer)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-()-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList)
WITH cu as item, count(r)* 10 as score
RETURN item,score,
{phase2:{name:"Watch List", score: score, query: apoc.text.format("MATCH p2= (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID:$customerID})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:BusinessCustomer)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(:WatchList) RETURN p2",[] )}} AS details

reports.title: Accounts on Watchlist

settings.description: Customers on Watch List with High Risk Factor

reports.title: Account Person - Fraud Level Indication
reports.query:
MATCH (da:DepositAccount{accountHolderID: $neodash_depositaccount_accountholderid_5})<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(cu:AccountHolder)-[r:MAKES_PAYMENTS_TO]-(cus)-[:IS_LISTED_ON]->(wl:WatchList)
RETURN wl.riskFactor*100 AS FraudScore ORDER BY FraudScore LIMIT 1
